name: Rescue Mission (amirkarajko)
description:
Rescue mission is an action 2D shooter game created in RPG (role-playing game) style.

Gameplay

The game has four missions. First mission is based on the Stealth mode in which you have to rescue prisoners in the forest, destroy the robot and kill the boss. In second mission is in building where you need to defuse 5 bombs on time and boss is the Excavator. Third mission is driving on motorcycle. Fourth mission is Train.

How to play

The game requires keyboard or touch screen. If you play with keyboard, the controls are: - W/A/S/D: move - K: shoot - J: action - I: inventory - Escape: exit (quit game)

Google Play Store link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=amirkarajko.rescuemission
